Services

Serving Over 200 Clients Around the World

Have an idea and you don’t know where to start? Contact us for a consultation. We can discuss and elaborate together all the fine details of the project.

Improve your business and projects efficiency Work with professionals

free consultation

Software Development

Do you need a Website or a Desktop software to assist you and to increase your work performance? We offer complete solutions. Our team can do all the work from planning to implementing and maintaining.

Mobile Applications

Let the professionals operate and do the administrative work. Email servers, Database servers, Webservers: all can be handled by our sys-ops.

Drivers and Electronic Devices Protocols

We have experience with software solutions that require low level communication with electronic devices, including printers(such as Datecs recipe printers), scanners(mobile camera scanning, video scanning), bluetooth transmitters, security systems, and many others.

Servers and Database Maintenance

Having a responsive interaction and a modern look is indeed important in today’s software, especially for mobile applications. Need a mobile app for Android or iOS platforms? We’d love to hear about it!
